task_name: Check the status of your iPhone repair on apple.

description.thought: To check the status of an iPhone repair on Apple's website, I need to go to the Apple support website and navigate to the repair tracking section.  Since there's no accessibility tree yet, I'll start by going to the Apple support page.
description.action: Navigating to Apple's support website to initiate the repair status check.
